communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

Electronic copies of all packets, workbooks, worksheets, and other materials used during Residential Rehabilitation Unit (RRU) programming at Five Points Correctional Facility.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Chris Gelardi

title: Furry Appeal Meta (Federal Bureau of Investigation)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Records documenting FBI's search referenced in OIP's decision in Appeal No. A-2023-00488.  By way of context, OIP states in the decision that while the appeal was pending, FBI "conducted a [further] search but it could locate no responsive records subject to the FOIA in its files."  I am looking for records that would show what repositories and files were searched and what parameters were used for the search.  I'm not sure if these would be in processing notes or documented elsewhere. Please contact me if you need more clarity on what I am requesting.

2. The communications and notes of any communications between FBI and OIP pertaining to Appeal No. A-2023-00488 or request NFP-143322.

3. OIP's policies and procedures applicable to communications between OIP and an agency that is the subject of an appeal, while the appeal is pending.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Matthew Topic

title: Furry Appeal Meta (Department of Justice, Office of Information Policy)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Records documenting FBI's search referenced in OIP's decision in Appeal No. A-2023-00488.  By way of context, OIP states in the decision that while the appeal was pending, FBI "conducted a [further] search but it could locate no responsive records subject to the FOIA in its files."  I am looking for records that would show what repositories and files were searched and what parameters were used for the search.  I'm not sure if these would be in processing notes or documented elsewhere. Please contact me if you need more clarity on what I am requesting.

2. The communications and notes of any communications between FBI and OIP pertaining to Appeal No. A-2023-00488 or request NFP-143322.

3. OIP's policies and procedures applicable to communications between OIP and an agency that is the subject of an appeal, while the appeal is pending.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Matthew Topic

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Full names, titles, salaries and email addresses of every employee who works for the City of Denver's Department of Excise and License office, including the Director and investigators.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

pooanon
